post.body: I would be interested in testing for you. Was trying to send you a Direct Message but it couldn't get it to you. More info though?
That sucks, not a merry christmas when that kind of stuff happens. Are you stranded?
agreed, there are many resources available. But finding the good ones is sometimes a task in and of itself. But a good job still
Nice job on the article, was a good quick read. Links out to some other good articles too. Will have to read them too
I'm out. G'night all
I am loving the sound of this deadline approaching. It sounds just like a funny car on the race way.
Trying to fix my wife's Apple Mail. So out of my normal here. Aren't Mac's "Just supposed to work" whatever I have decided I hate apple mail
Just updated my blog (CTE Visions) you can find it here http://tinyurl.com/9bts8b
Urbanicity? Anyone ever heard of that one? It is new to me but whatever.
I got games and toys to play with but now the family party is going to start. So no playing yet as they will be at my house within minutes
Merry Christmas to you all. My gift to you is this little buzz on your phone, okay and to wish you the best in your day.
Well the wife and I decided that it might be fun to do what we used to do when we dated. Midnight mass here we come
Well the festivities have begin, and one computer fixed. Next...
BTW, Santa's little helpers = FedEX, UPS, DHL and the normal mail delivery
Reported that Santa is now leaving Scotland. Will be flying over the Atlantic soon. Again no delays and is running on time
Downtown might be dead but don't worry I found everyone. They are on I-15 trying to get to Davis County
Dang, downtown is dead. I shouldn't watch so many horror shows cause my car is the only one in the parking terrece
Ahhh, headed home now for some parting. Got a lot done today cause no clients called. Kind of was a nice thing. Merry Christmas all.
It is reported that Santa is headed on his way to Cairo. Seems ahead of schedule this year. Must have been more bad kids there this year
Oh I am so excited, he is getting so close. Follow Santa's progress: http://tinyurl.com/6e2l3p
